content.rendered:
Rainbow Village is a small hamlet in the Nantun District, west of Taichung city, an area that was a chunk of Taichung City before it was amalgamated with Taichung County. Considered to its appellation, Rainbow, the specialty of the village lies in its dazzling and flamboyant painted houses and streets which appeals to every eye. The district of Taichung is providential for this epitome of temptation. Though, it is a quirky village still it is one of the most vibrant, liveliest and colorful spots in Taiwan. In view of that, it was named the Rainbow Village.

Fetching Thousands of Globetrotters

The amalgamation of all these vibrant colors are in accordance with its name. The Rainbow Village is remarkably a temptation for worldwide tourists. Nonetheless, the fusion of flamboyant colors is the greatest enticement and fetching a thousands of people. Moreover, this amalgamation is to the point to its name, the Rainbow Village. There is not a ting of uncertainty that it is essentially worthy to visit this fantastically beautiful place. Just like the variance in the colors of this tiny settlement, it is also enriching and stirring in its antiquity.

The exciting story behind colorful Rainbow Village

The Rainbow Village was originally named Caihongjuan Village established for veteran soldiers. Since the village was not identically populous so the developers wanted to get hold of this abode for their purposes and demolish its beinghood. On this account, one of the residents, Mr. Hung, of village initiated painting his house with the waggish characters and animals in the showy and lavish colors just to make crystal clear to the consultants that he is not going to leave his domicile. When he started off this uplifting bustle his neighbors entreated to paint their homes as well. Nonetheless, this was a sort of remonstration against the consultants. Thence, Mr. Hung kept the village safe by daubing colors on the walls with rainbow colors. Consequently, an enthralling and alluring settlement of 11 original houses is persisted.

Hues of the Rainbow Village

The Rainbow Village also has a discrete fan base for the progenies as well. The vivacious, sharp and glitzy colors amplify its charm and tempt profuse sightseers. It is worthy to mention that it is less time consuming to call on and amused by this flashy and visually appealing place. The intriguing and colorful walls of the houses, amusing characters on it and a flawless sprinkling of colors are crafting this place a public-eye.

Interesting Minutiae

He has added the vibrant murals that embellish the walls and alleyways of the village to make it an ultimate astonishing place for the tourists. The ever-expanding oeuvre of art is a manifestation of dogs, cats, planes, and his favorite celebrities, including Kung Fu legend Bruce Lee. The appellation of the village, Rainbow Village, is more than accurate for the portrayal of colorful comic figures.

A Paradise for Instagrammers

A stimulating facet of the Rainbow Village is that it is more celebrated among Instagrammers for its picturesque magnificence. It would not be wrong to entitle this colorful place a veritable paradise for Instagrammers and selfie chasers. Correspondingly, the place is also eye-catching for the adherents of arts and the ones who adore playing with colors.

To sum up, the place is mounting reputation and growing as limelight in Taichung that is fetching the superfluous number of tourists ranging from all ages. Trip to this wacky and eccentric place would be definitely a memorable one.
